## cilium recorder update

Update individual pcap recorder

```
cilium recorder update [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --caplen uint       Capture Length (0 is full capture)
      --filters strings   List of filters ('<srcCIDR> <srcPort> <dstCIDR> <dstPort> <proto>')
  -h, --help              help for update
      --id uint           Identifier
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```
